name: Hop Around！Don't Hit Black
description:
Free time on your hands?
Fingers itching to have some FUN?

*****************************************

Hop Around helps you kill time and de-stresses your mind
The more balls you hop-on, the more points you earn! Endless fun waiting for you!

HOW TO PLAY
Hop your ball, hold the screen to move, break all balls to reach the high score, avoid the black object and the monster!
Jump to the furthest end!

FEATURES
-The ultimate bouncing game, the ball is literally bouncing, for real!
-One-handed - Simple to play, but challenging to master!
-Collectible cool awesome skins and power-ups!
-Challenge your friend on the leaderboard!
-Complete the missions to get the reward!
